cast.overview: Corporate downsizing expert Ryan Bingham spends his life in planes, airports, and hotels, but just as he’s about to reach a milestone of ten million frequent flyer miles, he meets a woman who causes him to rethink his transient life.
cast.title: Up in the Air

cast.overview: Aibileen Clark is a middle-aged African-American maid who has spent her life raising white children and has recently lost her only son; Minny Jackson is an African-American maid who has often offended her employers despite her family's struggles with money and her desperate need for jobs; and Eugenia "Skeeter" Phelan is a young white woman who has recently moved back home after graduating college to find out her childhood maid has mysteriously disappeared. These three stories intertwine to explain how life in Jackson, Mississippi revolves around "the help"; yet they are always kept at a certain distance because of racial lines.
cast.title: The Help

cast.overview: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.
cast.title: Promising Young Woman

details.biography: ​Chris Lowell (born October 17, 1984) is an American film and television actor, best known for playing Stosh 'Piz' Piznarski in the CW noir drama Veronica Mars and William 'Dell' Parker in the ABC Grey's Anatomy spin-off, Private Practice.
details.name: Chris Lowell
